name: Chaos Drifter
description:
Drive, dodge and shoot are the watchwords in Chaos Drifter’s arenas. Survive, buy cars and upgrade them to defeat your enemies!
  • Ennemies arrive in waves to destroy you. Defeat them to earn random upgrades. Survive 12 waves to complete an arena.
  • There are 12 vehicles and 8 weapons to choose among. Each of these items can be upgraded.
  • Good luck on the roads!
